verses.verse: Make a joyful noise<WH7321> unto God<WH430>, all you lands<WH776>:
Sing forth<WH2167> the honor<WH3519> of his name<WH8034>: make<WH7760> his praise<WH8416> glorious<WH3519>.
Say<WH559> unto God<WH430>, How terrible<WH3372> are you in your works<WH4639>! through the greatness<WH7230> of your power<WH5797> shall your enemies<WH341> submit themselves unto you<WH3584>.
All the earth<WH776> shall worship<WH7812> you<WH2167>, and shall sing unto you<WH2167>; they shall sing to your name<WH8034>. Selah<WH5542>.
Come<WH3212> and see<WH7200> the works<WH4659> of God<WH430>: he is terrible<WH3372> in his doing<WH5949> toward the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>.
He turned<WH2015> the sea<WH3220> into dry<WH3004> land<WH5674>: they went through the flood<WH5104> on foot<WH7272>: there did we rejoice in him<WH8055>.
He rules<WH4910> by his power<WH1369> for ever<WH5769>; his eyes<WH5869> behold<WH6822> the nations<WH1471>: let not the rebellious<WH5637> exalt<WH7311> themselves<WH5542>. Selah.
O bless<WH1288> our God<WH430>, you people<WH5971>, and make the voice<WH6963> of his praise<WH8416> to be heard<WH8085>:
Which holds<WH7760> our soul<WH5315> in life<WH2416>, and allowed<WH5414> not our feet<WH7272> to be moved<WH4132>.
For you<WH430>, O God, have proved<WH974> us<WH6884>: you have tried us<WH3701>, as silver is tried<WH6884>.
You brought<WH935> us into the net<WH4686>; you laid<WH7760> affliction<WH4157> upon our body<WH4975>.
You have caused men<WH582> to ride<WH7392> over our heads<WH7218>; we went<WH935> through fire<WH784> and through water<WH4325>: but you brought us out<WH3318> into a wealthy place<WH7310>.
I will go<WH935> into your house<WH1004> with burnt offerings<WH5930>: I will pay<WH7999> you my vows<WH5088>,
Which my lips<WH8193> have uttered<WH6475>, and my mouth<WH6310> has spoken<WH1696>, when I was in trouble<WH6862>.
I will offer<WH5927> unto you burnt sacrifices<WH5930> of fatlings<WH4220>, with the incense<WH7004> of rams<WH352>; I will offer<WH6213> bullocks<WH1241> with goats<WH6260>. Selah<WH5542>.
Come<WH3212> and hear<WH8085>, all you that fear<WH3373> God<WH430>, and I will declare<WH5608> what he has done<WH6213> for my soul<WH5315>.
I cried<WH7121> unto him with my mouth<WH6310>, and he was extolled<WH7311> with<WH8478> my tongue<WH3956>.
If I regard<WH7200> iniquity<WH205> in my heart<WH3820>, the Lord<WH136> will not hear me<WH8085>:
But truly<WH403> God<WH430> has heard<WH8085> me<WH7181>; he has attended to the voice<WH6963> of my prayer<WH8605>.
Blessed<WH1288> be God<WH430>, which has not turned away<WH5493> my prayer<WH8605>, nor his mercy from me<WH2617>.
